task.title: Replacing simple items with editable items

taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have an editable table displayed in the Editor area. This table must contain at least one Domain column.
taskbody.context: To replace a simple item in a table Domain column with an editable item (widget):

step.cmd: In the Domain column, right-click on the desired simple item.
Select Set Editable Widget and then, select one of the editable widgets.
step.stepresult: The item is replaced with an editable widget.

step.cmd: In the Properties view pane, set the value of the property Dataset attribute.
